page.title: 06NEW HARTLEY:SHOPS,CONTINUED.
page.content:
{Off Licence Mr.Jobson's shop has been open{7 {days a week}for{2 years}now. They get a lot of regular customers. The owners do not like living here,but would like a bigger shop.
{CO-OP The shop has been open for {60 {years,6 days a week.}They get a lot of customers who are mostly very friendly. The customers like the way the shop is situated and don't think they need any improvements.
{PAPER HUT Newspapers are sold from a hut because there are no more shops. The hut is open from 6-30a.m. It sells papers, sweets, cards, gifts etc.
